taskbody.prereq: To successfully multiply numbers, you must know what is multiplication.

context.p: Use this task to multiply two numbers using the multiplication feature of the JPS calculator.

taskbody.result: The result from the multiplication is displayed.
taskbody.example: If you want to multiply 2 and 3, the equation will look like 3x2=6. The result 6 appears on the display screen.
